context_bundle.summary: CLI toolbox with phi-find (PhiSHRI), cel-cli (context), es.exe (Everything), phi-screenshot (capture). KALIC's everything-mcp-rs has dual-mode: CLI commands + MCP server in one binary.

onboarding.quick_start:
CLI Toolbox locations:
PRIMARY: C:\PhiDEX\tools\
  - phi-find.exe: Search PhiSHRI doors  
  - cel-cli.exe: Context tracking
  - es.exe: Everything CLI (official)
  - phi-screenshot.cmd/.ps1: Screen capture

ALTERNATE: X:\mcp-servers\everything-mcp-rs\
  - everything-mcp-rs.exe: Dual-mode (MCP + CLI)
    CLI: search, ext, recent, large, status
    MCP: No args (stdio mode)
known_errors: phi-screenshot needs GUI session (won't work headless)
